author: g11tech
content: yes, this will is going to part of all upcoming devnets (capella and eip4844), and next withdrawals devnet spinup next week is scheduled to have it

author: g11tech
content: as per my understanding from discussions üòÜ

author: g11tech
content: Question: what does freezing the historicalroots mean? the will have empty list assignment or the values which were in the parent block? my understanding is empty list but still better to clarify

author: arnetheduck
content: freezing means it will consist of the pre-capella entries but nothing else

author: g11tech
content: so block parent's entries on/post capella slot

author: g11tech
content: why not just empty list

author: arnetheduck
content: because the existing entries cover the pre-capella history

author: arnetheduck
content: the new field will only hold post-capella entries

author: g11tech
content: but only for last SLOTS_PER_HISTORICAL_ROOT

author: g11tech
content: which the new field should equvilantely have

author: g11tech
content: its a state bloat forever

author: arnetheduck
content: I'm not sure I understand your question - both the new field and the old field grow by one entry every `SLOTS_PER_HISTORICAL_ROOT`, or roughly 20kb/year (for the new field)

author: arnetheduck
content: each entry covers an interval of slots in the history of the chain, so yes, it'll keep growing albeit slowly ..

author: arnetheduck
content: before capella, the old field was added to - after capella, the new field gets added to - there's not much more to it

author: g11tech
content: ahh yes because we don't transition date to new one

author: g11tech
content: thanks

author: arnetheduck
content: we might, in a future HF (if there's appetite for it) but it's not critical (such data can easily be hardcoded in clients and checked against a recent state)

author: g11tech
content: i am not sure if we make our hardforks scheduled/aligned on the SLOTS_PER_HISTORICAL_ROOT boundaries since it would cool to start off new hardfork with an entry into historical roots/summaries
